import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' function PizzaBlock({ sizes, name, price, imgUrl, types }) { const [pizzaSize, setPizzaSize] = React.useState(sizes[0]) const [pizzaType, setPizzaType] = React.useState(types[0]) const typesName = ['традиционное', 'тонкое'] const dispatch = useDispatch() const pizzaCount = useSelector(state => state.cart.pizzaCount) return (

{name}

    {types.map(type =>
  • setPizzaType(type)} > {typesName[type]}
    • )}
    {sizes.map((size) =>
  • setPizzaSize(size)} className={size === pizzaSize ? 'active' : ''} > {size} см
    • )}
от {price} ₽
) } export default PizzaBlock
